briefdescription.para: This is the delimiter for combined strings.

memberdef.name: MKQR_VBIND
memberdef.initializer: { std::bind(&MKQR::Validator::fnName, this, std::placeholders::_1, std::placeholders::_2, std::placeholders::_3), paramValue }

briefdescription.para: Binds a function pointer as a validator function.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the function to do the validation
The value of the additional parameter. You can separate multiple parameters by using the pipe | delimiter

briefdescription.para: Defines a validator which is a pair of property name and queue of functions that need to return true for the parameter to be validated.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the property of this validator queue
One or multiple MKQR_BIND calls which make the validator queue
